script:
1). How are you coming with crafting the mission statement?
It's going pretty smoothly. 
I'll come tomorrow.
He did come, on Tuesday.
2). Whose responsibility is customer service?
This is Mr. Daniels.
I know whose.
It's Ms. Hobbes'. 
3). Wouldn't you rather work Wednesday and take Friday off?
I would want working Wednesday.
I didn't want to work on Friday.
This week I'd prefer Wednesday off.
